evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: Each Settlement Class Member is hereby deemed conclusively to have released the Released Claims against the Released Parties.

extracted.value: Each Settlement Class Member is hereby deemed conclusively to have released the Released Claims against the Released Parties.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: Each Settlement Class Member is hereby barred and permanently enjoined from prosecuting, commencing or continuing any of the Released Claims against the Released Parties.

extracted.value: Each Settlement Class Member is hereby barred and permanently enjoined from prosecuting, commencing or continuing any of the Released Claims against the Released Parties.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: The Court hereby retains jurisdiction solely for the purposes set forth in the Settlement Agreement.

extracted.value: The Court hereby retains jurisdiction solely for the purposes set forth in the Settlement Agreement.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: This action is hereby dismissed with prejudice, subject to the retention of jurisdiction as hereafter provided.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: 1. Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement was entered into between the Settling Defendant and the Settlement Class in good faith and without collusion.

extracted.value: Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement was entered into between the Settling Defendant and the Settlement Class in good faith and without collusion.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: 2. Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement is fair, adequate, and reasonable.

extracted.value: Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement is fair, adequate, and reasonable.

evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.text: 3. Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement is hereby approved.

extracted.value: Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement is hereby approved.
